name: Cuborz
description:
Cuborz is our first game we ever made and we have decided to share it. Cuborz is the first game in our Cuborz series, Cuborz II coming out it late 2017. Cuborz is an action-arcade game where you must avoid obstacles.

Cuborz II will have lots more levels, power ups, customization, and might even be for mobile!
